comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: There's probably a Kickhams club in every county in Ireland.  I note that the Ballymun Kickhams club was formed in 1969 when CJ Kickhams and Ballymun Gaels merged.  There is a Kickhams club in Dundrum Tipperary but I imagine that the photograph comes from the old CJ Kickhams on Dublins north side!  The Glasnevin Ballymun area in those days was rural and they are a healthy bunch of young men.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Thought that too! ONLY nagging doubt is that most Poole photos were taken in South/South-East of the country, and that's why I was slightly veering towards a Tipperary team.

On the other hand, might indeed have been the Dublin team pictured before/after a match in the South-East...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
